about_the_game:
Did you know a third of all plastic litter found in the sea is made up of plastic bottles? Matchala Games has made Coral Quest, an underwater ocean runner aimed at raising awareness about plastic and how it effects our oceans and marine life. We are donating 25% of all proceeds to organizations directly cleaning our oceans up, more about the game below:

Help Polly, Betty, Chloe and friends clean up the underwater plastic and debris by swimming and dodging as fast as you can in new and endless running game!

- Dash and move in 9 different lanes, a completely unique control system!
- Colorful and stunning ocean graphics!
- Unlock new characters and equip the coolest accessories
- Complete Fun Milestones to create your habitat
- Collect and recycle all of your plastic to make the ocean a clean place to live
- Test your aptitude by trying our challenging and crazy fun underwater challenges
- Play fun mini games daily to claim prizes and treasures

Download for game now and start a new challenge of using less plastic!

highlighted.name: Get daily presents from Mr. Seal
See some lazy Lobsters during your ocean cleanup
See some unique passage ways underwater
Wear multiple accessories at the same time
A prettier arc when you start running

detailed_description:
We are different!

Play a game which donates to make Mother Earth a better place

Matchala Games will donate 25% of all proceeds to cleaning up our oceans from plastic and other debris impacting marine life and their homes


About the Game

Did you know a third of all plastic litter found in the sea is made up of plastic bottles? Matchala Games has made Coral Quest, an underwater ocean runner aimed at raising awareness about plastic and how it effects our oceans and marine life. We are donating 25% of all proceeds to organizations directly cleaning our oceans up, more about the game below:

Help Polly, Betty, Chloe and friends clean up the underwater plastic and debris by swimming and dodging as fast as you can in new and endless running game!

- Dash and move in 9 different lanes, a completely unique control system!
- Colorful and stunning ocean graphics!
- Unlock new characters and equip the coolest accessories
- Complete Fun Milestones to create your habitat
- Collect and recycle all of your plastic to make the ocean a clean place to live
- Test your aptitude by trying our challenging and crazy fun underwater challenges
- Play fun mini games daily to claim prizes and treasures

Download for game now and start a new challenge of using less plastic!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal-capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

name: Coral Quest

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10, 64-bit versions only
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, and DX12-capable GPUs
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: An underwater running game, where Polly & friends cleanup plastic and debris to make their home a more habitable place. Matchala Games is donating 25% of all proceeds to help clean up our oceans. Powered by compelling graphics, cute characters, accessories and a unique 9 lane running system
supported_languages: English, French, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Simplified Chinese, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Vietnamese, German, Russian
